entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:30 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
